Antón Álvarez Alfaro (Madrid, 16 de juli: Anton Alvarez Alfaro (Madrid, July/16th/1990), best known as C. Tangana, is a Spanish rapper of music  genres like trap, latin pop or regueton
Formed in 1973, AC/DC's high voltage roc: Formed in 1973, AC/DC's high voltage rock 'n' roll has flowed out into the world via consistently sold-out concert tours and global sales totaling more than 150 million albums and counting.
Miguel Ángel Martos Bello, mejor conocid: Miguel Angel Martos Bello, best known as Zarcort (formerlly known as Mikid or in his beginnings known as Paste) is a rapper and youtuber from Almeria, Spain. He is now very well known for his videogames themes, although in the past he was known for being part of the band Tinta Culta, with his cousin Piter G.
El grupo nace a principios de la década: The band was born in the beginnings of ths 90's at the highschool where Zatu was studying. With some friends they formed the band Straight From Da Kranny (SFDK). The name refers to the place where the band met. This changed to be 'Siempre Fuertes De Konciencia'(Always Konscince Strong). In 1993 Zatu recorded a demo named Outta Kranny. A year later Accion Sanchez joins the band and in 1995 they recorded another demo 'Tras mil vueltas'.
Twice es un grupo femenino surcoreano fo: Twice is a South-Korean women band created by JYP Entertainment through the tv programme Sixteen (2005). The band has nine components: Nayeon, Jeongyeon, Momo, Sana, Jihyo, Mina, Dahyun, Chaeyoung y Tzuyu. Twice officially made its debut on the 20 of October of 2015 launching The Story Begins minialbum.
BTS es una boy band surcoreana formada e: BTS is a South-Korean boy band formed in Seoul in 2010.2 It has seven components: Jin, Suga, J-Hope, RM, Jimin, V and Jungkook. It made its debut on the 13 of June of 2013, under the company Big Hit Entertainment, with the song 'No More Dreams', included in its first single Cool Skool.
Rosalía Vila Tobella (San Esteban de Sas: Rosalia Vila Tobella (San steban de Sasroviras, Barcelona; 25 of September of 1993), known just as Rosalia, is a Spanish singer, actress, composer and producer. She has been awarded with two Latin Grammy Awards by 'Malamente', and five by her second album El mal querer, that made her  the most awarded by the Latin Arts and  Recording Science Academy Spanish artist due to just an album, and two MTV Video Music Awards.
The Rolling Stones es una banda británic: The Rolling Stones is a British rock band from London. The band was created in April 1962 by Brian Jones, Mick Jagger, Keith Richards, Bill Wyman, Chalie Watts and Ian Stewart. Brian Jones was fired in June 1969, dying three weeks later, and was replaced by the guitarist Mick Taylor, who left the band in 1975, and replaced by Ronnie Wood.
Beginning in the mid- to late '60s as a: Beginning in the mid- to late '60s as a Beatlesque ensemble, they quickly developed as songwriters and singers to create a style of their own that carried them from psychedelia to progressive pop.
QUEEN is Freddie Mercury, Brian May, Rog: QUEEN is Freddie Mercury, Brian May, Roger Taylor and John Deacon and they play rock n' roll.
KISS is an American rock band formed in: KISS is an American rock band formed in New York City in December 1972. Easily identified by its members' trademark face paint and stage outfits, the group rose to prominence in the mid and late-1970s on the basis of their elaborate live performances, which featured fire breathing, blood spitting, smoking guitars, and pyrotechnics. Kiss has been awarded 24 gold albums to date.
Formed in 1981 by drummer Lars Ulrich an: Formed in 1981 by drummer Lars Ulrich and guitarist and vocalist James Hetfield, Metallica have become one of the most influential and commercially successful rock bands in history.
Founded in Hannover, West Germany in 196: Founded in Hannover, West Germany in 1965, Scorpions were part of the first wave of metal in the 1970’s with their debut album, Lonesome Crow, released in 1972.
Global Music Icon Ricky Martin continues: Global Music Icon Ricky Martin continues to soar in his third decade as a leader in the Entertainment Industry.
7 Notas 7 Colores es un grupo de música: 7 Notas 7 Colores is a rap band from El prat de Llobregat founded in 1993. In its time it was one of the most representative bands not just in the national scene, but in Latin America, launching some of its albums in the U.S.A. It is said that 7 Notas 7 Colores is one of the pioneering rap bands in Spanish.
ABBA fue un grupo sueco de música pop, i: ABBA was a Swedish pop group formed by Agneha Fältskog, Björn Ulvaeus, Benny Andersson and Anni-Frid 'Frida' Lyngstad. Abba won its popularity using catching melodies, simple lyrics and a sound of its own, characterized  by the female voices harmony and the 'wall of sound'.
U2 es una banda de rock alternativo orig: U2 is an alternative rock band from Dublin (Ireland), formed in 1976 by Bono (voice), The Edge (guitar, keyboard and voice), Adam Clayton (bass), and Larry Mullen Jr. (drums).
Depeche Mode es una banda británica de m: Depeche Mode is a British electronic band formed in 1980 by Vince Clarke, Andrew Fletcher, Martin Gore and David Grahan. After its debut album Speak & Spell in 1981, Clarke left the band and was replaced by Alan Wilder, who was a component until 1995. From then on, Gahan, Gore and Fletcher have continued with the project as a trio.
Marshall Bruce Mathers III (St Joseph, M: Marshall Bruce Mathers III (St Joseph, Misouri; October 17 1972), known by his artistic name Eminem, and also by his alter ego Slim Shady, is a North American rapper, musical producer and actor. His artistic name comes from the join of the first letters of his name:M&M, whereas his alter ego's nickname was first known in 1997 with his first album named The Slim Shady EP. He is considered by several media as 'The Rap King'.
Michael Joseph Jackson (Gary, Indiana; 2: Michel Joseph Jackson (Gary, Indiana; August, 29, 1958-Los Angeles, California; June, 25, 2009) was an American singer, composer, musical producer, dancer, actor and philantropist. Known as 'The Pop King', his contributions and recognition in music and dance history, besides his promoted personal life, made him an international figure in the popular culture for more than four decades.
The Commodores es un grupo estadounidens: The Commodores is an American band, famous by its funk/soul musical style, that stood out in the 1970-1980 decades. It was formed in Detroit in 1968, and the following year it signed a contract with Motown Records.
Magnatiz en sus inicios no se llamaban a: Magnatiz in its beginnings was not named like this, but Muerte Acustica. Under this name they recorded their first demo called Las rimas escritas benditas in 1997. A year later they edited their second demo, this time supported in CD and called Manada camos a... As Magnatiz, in 2000, they publish their first work in a professional format under Boa discography. A maxi called Triste Navidad and a maxisingle with the same name as the band with two unknown themes.
La Camerata Bariloche es un conjunto de: Camerata Bariloche is an Argentinian chamber music group, founded in 1967, that has reached international prestige. Throughout its history it has carried out more than twentyfive international tours, playing in concertrooms in 33 countries in America, Europe and Asia. The idea of creating the Camerata was of the musician Alberto Lisy, who organized Chamber Music Festivals in Buenos Aires, with the participation of Argentinian and foreign musicians.
